attributes.action: Review the laws concerning negligent practice to apply to chief executives etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Fred Goodwin's £700000 annual pension is an example of reward despite gross negligence.  Doctors, engineers,lawyers etc can be pursued for negligent practice - but this does not seem to be the case for the 'golden elite'. In fact we seem to have a culture which encourages individuals to aspire to greed with little or no regard to the results of the risks to society.
